# Defensive Combat Training (Feat)
## Overview
You excel at defending yourself from all manner of combat maneuvers.

**Benefit:** You treat your total Hit Dice as your base attack bonus when calculating your Combat Maneuver Defense (see Chapter 8 of Core Rulebook 1).

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook 1, pg. 121
